about_the_game:
Play using rhythm!

Spears of a Heart is a game where you need the music to go further.

Tons of mini-games awaits you, where rhythm is the key to success.
Inspired by classics like Rhythm Heaven.
Collect songs to use in the mini games by picking up broken vynils.
Play real life instruments to cast special effects or situations, resolve puzzles, or just for fun!

Start a new life and explore the island


Geck island is a mysterious land, and you arrived out of nowhere.
Help it grow, customize it, and unleash the secrets of the TABULA center.
You will need to keep in mind the seasons to be able to access different resources.
The island lets you explore 3 different enviroments, including Tundra, and a cool beach!


Time passes by, and events will occur in the surroundings.
Celebrate birthdays by giving away presents.
Attend to thematic festivals and parties with cool contests!
Its up to you whether you take part of them or dont!

DUNGEONS: Simulations


Each time you get into a dungeon, its something different!
Pick a song, and use it to mark the flow of the interactions inside the dungeons!
Your enemies and you will attack at the rhythm of the music.
The objects react to the music.
Miss a beat and you will lose all bonuses!
Discover the secret stores, unlock weapons, extensions, and many items to change your strategy!
You can even use collectable cards to improve the experience inside these simulations.
Weapons include cool rhythmic swords, spells, and even a methronome!

Find SIGNALS and catch ELFAs!

You will be given a cool device that lets you detect ELFAs!
ELFAs are monsters that you can synchronize with using music and the PULSE to extract their resources.
Each ELFA provides an elemental resource necessary to craft various items for the world!
Different season means different ELFAs, and thus different resources!

Meet the interns

Everyone in the island comes to the TABULA center with a reason to stay, and it is up to you to find out!
Interact with them, sing with them, play instruments for them. Many posibilities available!
You are however not forced to do any of it, its up to you how you enjoy your stay in GECKO island!
The people will not always be open to share information with you, but your actions will make them open up eventually.
Get to know them and you will access a lot of extra content!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+ / 8.1 / 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI 7770, Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 Processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX960+
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Start a new life and explore the mysterious island. Meet the people and unleash their secrets while you enjoy tons of rhythm mini-games. Dig the musical dungeons, sing at the karaoke, or synchronize monsters to get crafting resources!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
